text: Hello. Hello. I'd like to speak to Paul for home and please. I'm afraid he's with a client at the moment. Can I take a message? Okay. Do you know when he will be available? I'm not sure, but I can take a message or just get him to pull you back. Well, what I need is quite hard to explain. So, could you just tell him when they called from Prolingua? Sure. And what's the number? He should have it, but just in case it's 0 to 0, 411, 7685. Okay. I'll let him know. The only thing is that I'm leaving in two hours at four o'clock. After that, it'll have to wait till tomorrow. Okay. I'll tell him. That's great. Thanks very much. No problem. Bye-bye.
